lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs had stars and depth as they swept the injury-riddled Memphis Grizzlies in their first-round Western Conference series.

headline.print_headline: Spurs Beat Grizzlies 116-95 in Game Four to Sweep Series
headline.main: Spurs Beat Grizzlies 116-95 in Game Four to Sweep Series

snippet: The San Antonio Spurs had stars and depth as they swept the injury-riddled Memphis Grizzlies in their first-round Western Conference series....
